      • readTheData

        public void readTheData​(java.util.Scanner in)
        This private method reads the data from the data file and places it into a data structure for later processing, should the user decide to do that. (Recall that the input has already been scanned by the function fileContentsAreValid(), so redundant checks are not needed.)
        Parameters:
        in - The parameter is a Scanner object that is set up to read the input file
